title: CATCH: A Controllable Theme Detection Framework with Contextualized Clustering and Hierarchical Generation
summary: Theme detection is a fundamental task in user-centric dialogue systems, aiming to identify the latent topic of each utterance without relying on predefined schemas. Unlike intent induction, which operates within fixed label spaces, theme detection requires cross-dialogue consistency and alignment with personalized user preferences, posing significant challenges.
